website_summaries.verdict: An attractive ski jacket by a top name in winter gear that's versatile enough to wear in different types of weather conditions.
pros: This is a versatile jacket, as it can be worn three different ways depending on the outdoor temperature
Has several useful zippered pockets for storing small items while you ski
cons: Sizes tend to run on the small side
Rare reports of broken zippers upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: DON'T MISS ON YOUR SIZE!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, but........My daughter instructed me to buy a SMALL for her, and when she got it, it was a little too tight. I figured I could simply exchange it for a MEDIUM, and move on. Nope, had to return it for credit ($179.95), then REPURCHASE it ($239.95)! For some reason, this just doesn't seem right to me. Thanks, a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cookieman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Welp, this is amazing. I bought it so I could stop having 3 different jackets for different temps/weather conditions, and it's surpassed my expectations. I live in NYC and wore it in 30 degree weather with just a t-shirt, and was still toasty warm all through my Central Park walk. I wear a 36D bra size and bought a Large, and it fits perfectly, with room for a bulky sweater underneath if I so choose. Buy now; you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Senterfeit

customer_reviews.title: Just okay 😳
customer_reviews.text: This is the second coat I have tried from Amazon it is okay but both me and my husband got the same coat and they are both tight in the arm and shoulder area. The coats we got before were sent back defective so far just not impressed with the clothes I have purchased seems like they are defective or run off on sizes and weird fabrics hummm. My really old Columbia coat seems to be made better really heavy duty and had style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this coat! I can’t speak about the warmth because it’s August in Chicago but the quality seems good. I’m 5’1 with 36DD and I got a large. I wanted room for layers underneath and it fits well. The back just covers my butt and the sleeves are the right length. If you’re tall, this might not be the coat for you. I took off one star because the Northface emblem is a cheap looking sticker. It used to be embroidered. Also, the jacket smells like someone else’s perfume. It was definitely worn before. I even washed it and it still smells. Hope it fades by late fall.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K

customer_reviews.title: Do too tight
customer_reviews.text: It was too tight for my shoulders I normally wear a small and Northface and the jacket was just a little tight for me
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: She loves her new NF! She attends UT@Austin and weather is sure chilly and coat keeps her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: North Face
customer_reviews.text: You pay for the brand. The jacket is cute and multi functional but it didn't keep me warm in temperatures below 50 degree. I do like how easy it is to take apart for a "lighter" jacket.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Even cheaper than at Dick’s Sporting Goods!
customer_reviews.text: The price was a nickel cheaper. Even better: no sales tax or S/H! I am so excited about the versatility this coat brings. Plus, this color is DREAMY! Just what I need to perk up the dreariness of winter and take me into the rainy spring!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sizing error
customer_reviews.text: They sent an XXL instead of plus size 2XL. Not sure it’s worth trying for the correct size as this is an inventory problem and people stocking shelves don’t understand the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Should've been cheaper. It looks great. Not sure about warmth yet. Prob. Should've go thermo one.
customer_reviews.author: devona h.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket ... I luv northface .. Will purchase from u again
customer_reviews.author: shirl

customer_reviews.title: Great winter jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put this jacket is amazing! Purchased for winter weather, its light weight and extremely warm. I used it to take my kids to see the Ice Castle in Dillon Colorado. The jacket stayed dried during snowy weather and not once did I get cold in the 17 degree temps.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M Wood

customer_reviews.title: Northface Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. It has a zip out liner so you can use it for spring and winter. Being Northface it is a brand that is well made. Keeps you very warm. Beautiful color. Grea buy. A little costly but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CCory22

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jacket. Ordered this one and the blue. Kept the blue.
customer_reviews.author: lady

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry, warm, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is excellent. It is waterproof and versatile. I often use just part of the jacket depending on the weather. It keeps me so warm and dry. It is well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Halcomb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Jacket runs small in arms and shoulders and looks cheap with logo being a sticker and not stitched.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaF

customer_reviews.title: Love the red!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! The red is so bright and vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: No inner lining !!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in the mail and only received the outer shell !! No second inner lining which is what keeps you warm .. returning asap
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: There were no surprises with this purchase - it is TNF's fiery red (more of a vibrant orange), which performed as expected. It lacks a garter, but it is warm and water repellent.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and is useful
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and is useful. Not boxy in shape so looks nice on.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: 130 lbs and 5’2. I have a big bust and a S fit perfectly! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ran small in size
customer_reviews.text: Just received jacket and it ran small had to up it to a large.. I am 5 8" 137LBS. can t comment on anything else yet
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Must-have all weather jacket
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jacket!!! We had plans to travel to England and the weather was rainy and cold. I wanted to be warm, without the bulk of a heavy coat, and stay dry during our site seeing. This jacket exceeded ALL of my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Bluflayme943

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! I'm 5 ft 6in about 145lbs, pear shaped. The large hung on me like a bag but the medium is perfect. Great great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hope

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than size and long refund wait
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than size. Daughters a medium and sometimes small. Medium was tight fitting. Still waiting for refund through backcountry that is taking forever
customer_reviews.author: H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was hesitant to buy because of the price being so much lower than the one in the store but it’s exactly like the one in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing seemed a little tight. I usually wear a 6 but the small felt tight when I crossed my arms in front of me. I’ll exchange for the size M
customer_reviews.author: PMR

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket, but zipper problem!
customer_reviews.text: Was good jacket. But had to return it because the front zipper was not working.
customer_reviews.author: Shunmugam

customer_reviews.title: Item delivered is different from pictured
customer_reviews.text: Delivered only the outer wind breaker with no inner lining after a long wait. ITEM DIFFERENT FROM PICTURES! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Provides a lot of warmth.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is so warm and versatile. It has an inner jacket that is removable as well as the hood. Waterproof too.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: According to the chart, I should be large. I ordered medium and is baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Rosales

customer_reviews.title: A family smile to all of you
customer_reviews.text: Sister asked for this for Christmas and it delivered not just day early but she danced when she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Stover

customer_reviews.title: very warm
customer_reviews.text: love the jacket that its warm but not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Gail Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but it seemed cheap for north face... and the size was poor between the inside layer and outside layer as it was way too tight in the armpit area and I couldn’t drive with it on. I usually order an xsmall but I decided to get a small since north face is usually smaller in size but this jacket was too tight for me. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Neil A. Rosberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a very nice color and fits true to size. I ordered it too large so I could comfortably wear other winter gear with it, which has been great. When the hood was up and I pulled the elastic to tighten it, the visor covered my eyes. Otherwise, I am loving this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an almost all weather coat to wear on my outside morning duty. This is really perfect. I am petite and the small fits well. I love the royal blue color and the inner jacket is super cute by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket just run super small had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Takin'Ova

customer_reviews.title: I like It.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from dicks on a sale. I read some reviews either here or another site saying it’s difficult to put on or runs small, I don't think that at all. It slides right on and I think If anything it runs slightly big. I got a large and I have enough room for a sweater. I got this one because my last jacket was so heavy it was hurting my shoulders. I don't know that I’d pay full price for it however it’s really nothing spectacular. It’s a thinner jacket it your looking for a heavier one try the osito 3 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: B Schw

product_meta.title: The North Face Women's Carto Triclimate Jacket
feature_bullets: STAY DRY. Made with a DryVent shell, this jacket features a Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) Finish helps keep you dry when rain strikes. Inner lining is made from 100% recycled polyester taffeta.

PRIMALOFT BLACK. Made with recycled materials, PrimaLoft Black Insulation provides lightweight, insulated warmth. This synthetic insulation helps you retain heat so you can enjoy the outdoors. 100 g in body, 120 g in collar, 60 g in sleeves.
ADJUSTABLE COVERAGE. An exposed center front zip is durable and offers custom coverage depending on the weather.
ZIP STORAGE. Exposed, secure-zip hand pockets keep your belongings safe when you're out hiking or camping in colder weather.
ZIP IN, GEAR UP. This women's jacket features a zip-in-compatible integration system with complementing garments from The North Face.
